company_name: EXPRO - General Authority of Civil Aviation GACA
policy_holder: General Authority of Civil Aviation GACA

coverage_details.accommodation: Single Room (Standard suite covered up to 4,000 SAR)
coverage_details.std: Treatment of STD is covered regardless of how infection occurred, including: Nongonococcal urethritis, Trichomoniasis, HIV, Syphilis, Human Papillomavirus (genital warts), Neisseria gonorrhoeae, Genital herpes, Chancroid; up to annual limit unless otherwise stated.
coverage_details.checkup: Family doctors and checkup included, covered per National Health Services (Weqaya) guidelines
coverage_details.vaccination: Vaccination for children (up to age 6) as per MOH schedule and any updates. Adult vaccinations according to Weqaya guidelines. Coverage of (RSV) vaccination as per MOH.
coverage_details.optical_frame: Frames are covered up to 2,000 SAR with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible; frames are covered twice for children up to age 14.
coverage_details.birth_control: Contraceptive methods for pregnancy covered up to 1,500 SAR (not covered for parents scheme); Family Planning: cost of birth control for females covered up to 1,500 SAR.
coverage_details.obesity_surgery_bmi_over_35: Obesity surgical treatment overall coverage: 20,000 SAR. For Gastric Sleeve: NOT covered unless BMI >45 (else, follows coverage noted below). Other surgical obesity procedures covered if BMI ≥40, or ≥35 with complications, up to 20,000 SAR and list of specified procedures provided. Medication Liraglutide covered if BMI ≥40, or ≥35 with complications, up to overall 20,000 SAR.
coverage_details.kidney_transplant: Kidney transplant covered up to 250,000 SAR per insurance cover period.
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Surgery of the donor who will donate life organs covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.psychiatric: Psychiatric cases (including non-acute) covered up to 50,000 SAR; up to 4 visits for non-acute psychiatric.
coverage_details.hearing_aids_audiometry: Hearing aid covered up to 6,000 SAR; Newborn hearing screening covered up to 100,000 SAR (as part of national program for early detection and congenital anomalies).
coverage_details.dental_general: Covered up to 5,000 SAR with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible; includes crowns, bridges (up to dental limit), pins and posts for crowns, and scaling (once/year).
coverage_details.dental_corrective: Crowns and bridges covered up to dental limit.
coverage_details.dental_emergency: Emergency dental procedures included within dental coverage limit.
coverage_details.neo_natal_care: Premature baby care covered up to annual limit; coverage under mother’s policy for newborns up to 30 days from birth.
coverage_details.circumcision: Circumcision for males covered up to 500 SAR.
coverage_details.newborn_disability_screening: Disability cases, including cost of neonatal metabolic screening, covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.congenital: Acute congenital illnesses covered up to annual limit. Non-acute congenital illnesses covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.maternity: Maternity coverage (anti-natal care and NVD) up to 15,000 SAR; maternity complications, Caesarian section, and legal abortion covered up to annual limit; not covered for parents; epidural injection for delivery is covered.
coverage_details.optical: Covered up to 2,000 SAR with 20% up to 100 SAR deductible. Frames and contact lenses covered up to optical limit.
coverage_details.autism: Autism cases covered up to 50,000 SAR.
coverage_details.ear_piercing: Ear piercing for newborn females covered up to 300 SAR.
coverage_details.screening: National program for early detection for newborns (including congenital anomalies, heart malformations, and deafness) covered up to 100,000 SAR.
coverage_details.disability_cases: Covered up to 100,000 SAR; includes neonatal metabolic screening costs.
coverage_details.donor_organ_harvesting: Up to 50,000 SAR for cost of obtaining/harvesting donor organ.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Companion cost covered for all members and parents. Pre-existing and existing chronic conditions (with medications) are covered. Rehabilitation and artificial limbs covered up to 100,000 SAR. Joint replacement surgeries up to 50,000 SAR. Local ambulance covered. Allergy tests and treatment (if medically indicated) covered. Intensive care unit treatment covered. Psoriasis treatment covered. Infectious diseases requiring isolation at MOH hospitals are covered. All benefits mentioned in CHI are covered unless limited above. Home Healthcare covered (incl. post-surgical wound dressing, urinary catheter replacement, IV fluids post-surgery). Telemedicine covered. International SOS covered to transport in emergencies outside KSA. Medical devices for diabetes, pressure diseases, steam, etc covered. Nutritional supplements, vitamins, minerals covered when essential for medically indicated treatment and prescribed by SFDA licensed physician. Transportation of mortal remains covered up to 10,000 SAR. Babies milk up to 24 months of age (if medically indicated) covered. Joint replacement surgeries up to 50,000 SAR. Epidural injection for delivery covered. Separate medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit.
